chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_251
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
n. CHO must view himself or herself as a team leader responsible for improving 
the knowledge and skills of his/her staff by supporting them by identifying gaps and guiding to improve them 
than to just find fault in their work. The medical officer must keep the following points in mind while providing 
constructive and supportive feedback to the staff.
Key points for providing effective feedback
• It should be provided in a non-threatening and supportive manner.
• Tone of voice should be author
